code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[a,setA]=useState('');const[b,setB]=useState('');const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const handleAdd=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:8000/api/add/',{a:parseInt(a),b:parseInt(b)});setResult(response.data.result);}catch(error){console.error('Error:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Simple Calculator"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:a,onChange:e=>setA(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter first number"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:b,onChange:e=>setB(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter second number"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAdd,children:"Add"}),result!==null&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Result: ",result]})]});}export default App;
